text:
1. 登入行動郵局。
2. 點選「更多」＞「設定」＞「通知服務」＞「Email通知」，即可依「登入時間」或「當日登入次數」設定寄送條件。
本電子郵件係由系統自動發送，請勿直接回覆本郵件。
※以上內容如有任何建議或疑問，請惠賜教至中華郵政客服信箱 。
※24小時客服專線：[redacted_number]，手機請改撥付費電話[redacted_number]。
trans:
1. Log in to the mobile post office.
2. Click "More" > "Settings" > "Notification Services" > "Email Notifications", and you can set the delivery conditions based on "Login Time" or "Number of Logins on the Day".
This email is automatically sent by the system, please do not reply directly to this email.
※ If you have any suggestions or questions regarding the content above, please send them to the Chunghwa Post customer service email.
※ 24-hour customer service hotline: [redacted_number], for mobile phones, please dial the paid phone number [redacted_number].
